definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

sentences.english: We didn't come to an agreement because of their demands that were less than reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 由於他們的要求不近情理，我們沒能達成協議。

sentences.english: House and Senate conferees have struck a deal on the new farm bill.
sentences.chinese: 參衆兩院與會代表已就新的農業法案達成協議。

sentences.english: This is the prerequisite for striking a deal at COP15.
sentences.chinese: 這是COP15能夠達成協議的前提。

sentences.english: Allows a carrier to lawfully charge a negotiated, non-tariff rate.
sentences.chinese: 允許承運人合法地收取已達成協議的，非運價本運價。

sentences.english: Allows parties to keep the negotiated rate confidential.
sentences.chinese: 允許簽約方對已達成協議的運價保密。

sentences.english: There is a two-year window for a deal tobe done.
sentences.chinese: 在達成協議之前有兩年的窗口期。

sentences.english: Pending a settlement, the status quo of the boundary should be maintained.
sentences.chinese: 在達成協議之前，必須維持邊界現狀。

sentences.english: An agreement was about to be reached when the other side raised new issues (or caused complications).
sentences.chinese: 快要達成協議時，對方又節外生枝。

sentences.english: Allows a carrier to lawfully charge a negotiated, non-tariff rate.
sentences.chinese: 允許承運人合法地收取已達成協議的，終止。

sentences.english: Article 88 A conciliation agreement must be based on voluntariness of both parties, and shall not be reached through compulsion.
sentences.chinese: 第八十八條調解達成協議，必須雙方自願，不得強迫。

sentences.english: But Washington is bracing itself for the possibility that it won't.
sentences.chinese: 但是華盛頓則一直擔心雙方不能達成協議的可能性。

sentences.english: If we come to terms, w’ll appoint you as our agent.
sentences.chinese: 如果達成協議，我們將指定你爲我方的代理。

sentences.english: It also synchronizes and establishes an agreement on procedures for error recovery and control of data integrity.
sentences.chinese: 它還對糾錯和數據整合的過程進行同步並達成協議。

sentences.english: The two ministers didn't close with each other until near the end of the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 這兩位外交使節直到會議將近結束時才達成協議。

sentences.english: After dealing with the evil, the wife told her that love, never within you alike.
sentences.chinese: 妻與妖達成協議後曾對妖說，你不懂得愛。

sentences.english: The two parties have bargained out the remaining obstacles to an agreement.
sentences.chinese: 雙方經過協商掃除了達成協議的遺留障礙。

definition: to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
to demand payment of money owing
